latestAction.text: By unanimous consent, the Bordallo amendment was withdrawn.

Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Bordallo amendment (A011). Mr. Regula stated that the Bordallo amendment sought to appropriate funds for an unauthorized program. The Chair sustained the point of order. (consideration: CR H6840)
By unanimous consent, the Bordallo amendment was withdrawn.
